More scenarios have been suggested recently. One is based on octupolar order of Cu-3 d orbital for bond nematicity under the Landau paradigm
32 , another is based on percolation of local pseudogaps which may be consistent with nematic domain phenomena near T *
33 , and a third is based on phenomena beyond the Landau paradigm, such as doped quantum spin liquid, which may explain the superlinear onset intrinsically
34 . Further theoretical and experimental investigations are highly desired to pin down a mechanism of the diagonal nematicity.
